mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_access_hourly_stats (gid, full_short_url, stat_date, stat_hour, pv_cnt, create_time, update_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{linkAccessHourlyStats.gid}, #{linkAccessHourlyStats.fullShortUrl}, #{linkAccessHourlyStats.statDate}, #{linkAccessHourlyStats.statHour}, #{linkAccessHourlyStats.pvCnt}, NOW(), NOW(), 0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE pv_cnt = pv_cnt + #{linkAccessHourlyStats.pvCnt}, update_time = NOW()
